class_notes: Contact Sorin Huh for permission to enroll. sorin.huh@emory.edu
course_description: In this course, a strong emphasis will be placed on the ability to produce and understand communications that are stylistically appropriate for professional and academic contexts as well as gaining further understanding of Korean culture and society.
